item.title: JavaScript Testing with Jest in IntelliJ IDEA
item.description: JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA is the best IDE I have ever worked with, and I guess don’t ever want to use anything else - or the tool I would prefer to use instead is yet to be invented. Where it all started Most of the time, I used IntelliJ for Java development. Everything just works, right out of the box. Awesome! However, then there is this moment where you use something else, Node.
